entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
